data.comment: San Jose kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Jose at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 10, San Jose are coming forward and Carlos Fierro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Alex Chilowicz awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, San Jose drives forward and Tommy Thompson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Carson San Jose drive forward through Andy Rios. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Carson a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 17, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
In the minute 19, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Jose are pushing forward but Carlos Fierro's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 25, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Alex Chilowicz signals a San Jose throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of San Jose.
Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Carson.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
In the minute 31, In Carson LA Galaxy attack through Sacha Kljestan. The finish is off target, however.
Alex Chilowicz awards San Jose a goal kick.
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
In the minute 32, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Throw-in for San Jose at Dignity Health Sports Park.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
Sebastian Lletget of LA Galaxy gets in a strike, but is off target.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Alex Chilowicz signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in San Jose's half.
San Jose to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Throw-in for San Jose at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 39, San Jose's Andy Rios gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for LA Galaxy, close to San Jose's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
In the minute 44, Goal! Nick Lima gives San Jose a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Andy Rios to set up the goal.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. LA Galaxy kick-off.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to San Jose.
Free kick San Jose.
In the minute 47, Emiliano Insua (LA Galaxy) gets a yellow card.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza gets in a shot but it is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 52, It's now 0-2 in Carson as Andy Rios scores for San Jose.
Carlos Fierro instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal kick for San Jose at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 55, LA Galaxy make their first substitution with Efrain Alvarez replacing Chicharito.
Diedie Traore is on a sub for Emiliano Insua for LA Galaxy.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 58, LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon is on target but unsuccessful.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In Carson a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Julian Araujo (LA Galaxy) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 63, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to San Jose.
San Jose push forward at Dignity Health Sports Park and Cristian Espinoza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined LA Galaxy defence.
San Jose to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In the minute 64, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
San Jose pushes forward through Andy Rios, whose finish on goal is saved.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 66, San Jose's Cristian Espinoza misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 68, Throw-in San Jose.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 70, Chris Wondolowski of San Jose smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Julian Araujo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 72, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
The away team replace Chris Wondolowski with Shea Salinas.
LA Galaxy's Yony Gonzalez gets in a shot on goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, San Jose have a goal kick.
Julian Araujo has recovered and rejoins the match in Carson.
The home team have replaced Sacha Kljestan with Carlos Harvey. This is the third substitution made today by Guillermo Schelotto.
In the minute 75, In Carson, San Jose push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Goal! San Jose extend their lead to 0-3 through Tommy Thompson.
In the minute 77, Free kick LA Galaxy.
Paul Marie is replacing Tommy Thompson for the away team.
LA Galaxy are coming forward and Cristian Pavon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for San Jose at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a San Jose throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 84, Cade Cowell is replacing Carlos Fierro for the away team.
The away team replace Cristian Espinoza with Siad Haji.
San Jose make their fifth substitution with Luis Felipe replacing Andy Rios.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Cade Cowell gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Jose.
In the minute 85, Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a fourth substitution, with Ethan Zubak replacing Yony Gonzalez.
Emil Cuello is on a sub for Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of San Jose.
Ethan Zubak for LA Galaxy drives towards goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In Carson, Nick DePuy (LA Galaxy) misses the target with a header.
Alex Chilowicz awards San Jose a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Cade Cowell (San Jose) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
San Jose drives forward and Luis Felipe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
San Jose's Luis Felipe misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Throw-in San Jose.
Full-time! The final score is 0-4.
Goal! San Jose extend their lead to 0-4 through Nick Lima.
Cade Cowell with an assist there.
